document_data.name: Halls of Justice
document_data.mainbody:
{{otheruses4|the temple to [[Tyr]]|the building in [[Muluk]]|Halls of Justice (Muluk)}}
The '''Halls of Justice''' was a temple of [[Tyr]] in the [[Castle Ward of Waterdeep]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The [[Church of Tyr]] in [[Waterdeep]] was led by Hammer Lord [[Hykros Allumen]].
